title: Unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information
body: When I try to install the new patch the installation stops at 33% and then this things shows up. I preinstalled LoL, tried changing my region, tried deleting "lol_air_client" but nothing helps. I would appreciate some help.

replies.body:
Issues at 33% during patching are typically caused by conflicting network settings since the patcher attempts to grab files from the patching servers during that time. I strongly encourage you to work through the common solutions in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step.

Let me know if that guide caused any change.

Im having the same issues as the person above.  I've manually reinstalled league twice, same unspecified error message both times, i even downloaded the "new" hextech repair tool, and still same thing, ive taken my firewalls out of commission...... still nothing, ive reset my ip address and flushed the dns. I've never had a major problem such as this before, usually Re-Downloading the game once works.

If your issue is happening **exactly at 33%** and the connection guide has caused no change, we'll need to take a closer look at your network settings. I recommend creating some system logs with our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attaching them to a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Our tech team will be able to work through those logs and find a permanent solution with you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
